verses.verse: When the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bring<WH935> thee into the land<WH776> whither thou goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it, and hath cast out<WH5394> many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> thee, the Hittites<WH2850>, and the Girgashites<WH1622>, and the Amorites<WH567>, and the Canaanites<WH3669>, and the Perizzites<WH6522>, and the Hivites<WH2340>, and the Jebusites<WH2983>, seven<WH7651> nations<WH1471> greater<WH7227> and mightier<WH6099> than thou;

And when the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them before<WH6440> thee; thou shalt smite<WH5221> them, and utterly<WH2763> destroy<WH2763> them; thou shalt make<WH3772> no covenant<WH1285> with them, nor shew mercy<WH2603> unto them:
Neither shalt thou make marriages<WH2859> with them; thy daughter<WH1323> thou shalt not give<WH5414> unto his son<WH1121>, nor his daughter<WH1323> shalt thou take<WH3947> unto thy son<WH1121>.

For they will turn away<WH5493> thy son<WH1121> from following<WH310> me, that they may serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods<WH430>: so will the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you, and destroy<WH8045> thee suddenly<WH4118>.

But thus shall ye deal<WH6213> with them; ye shall destroy<WH5422> their altars<WH4196>, and break down<WH7665> their images<WH4676>, and cut down<WH1438> their groves<WH842>, and burn<WH8313> their graven images<WH6456> with fire<WH784>.

For thou art an holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> thee to be a special<WH5459> people<WH5971> unto himself, above all people<WH5971> that are upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>.
The LORD<WH3068> did not set his love<WH2836> upon you, nor choose<WH977> you, because ye were more<WH7230> in number than any people<WH5971>; for ye were the fewest<WH4592> of all people<WH5971>:

But because the LORD<WH3068> loved<WH160> you, and because he would keep<WH8104> the oath<WH7621> which he had sworn<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, hath the LORD<WH3068> brought you out<WH3318> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and redeemed<WH6299> you out of the house<WH1004> of bondmen<WH5650>, from the hand<WH3027> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>.

Know<WH3045> therefore that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, he is God<WH430>, the faithful<WH539> God<WH410>, which keepeth<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and mercy<WH2617> with them that love<WH157> him and keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> to a thousand<WH505> generations<WH1755>;
And repayeth<WH7999> them that hate<WH8130> him to their face<WH6440>, to destroy<WH6> them: he will not be slack<WH309> to him that hateth<WH8130> him, he will repay<WH7999> him to his face<WH6440>.
Thou shalt therefore keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the judgments<WH4941>, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>, to do<WH6213> them.

Â¶ Wherefore it shall come to pass, if<WH6118> ye hearken<WH8085> to these judgments<WH4941>, and keep<WH8104>, and do<WH6213> them, that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall keep<WH8104> unto thee the covenant<WH1285> and the mercy<WH2617> which he sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1>:

And he will love<WH157> thee, and bless<WH1288> thee, and multiply<WH7235> thee: he will also bless<WH1288> the fruit<WH6529> of thy womb<WH990>, and the fruit<WH6529> of thy land<WH127>, thy corn<WH1715>, and thy wine<WH8492>, and thine oil<WH3323>, the increase<WH7698> of thy kine<WH504>, and the flocks<WH6251> of thy sheep<WH6629>, in the land<WH127> which he sware<WH7650> unto thy fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> thee.
Thou shalt be blessed<WH1288> above all people<WH5971>: there shall not be male<WH6135> or female barren<WH6135> among you, or among your cattle<WH929>.

And the LORD<WH3068> will take away<WH5493> from thee all sickness<WH2483>, and will put<WH7760> none of the evil<WH7451> diseases<WH4064> of Egypt<WH4714>, which thou knowest<WH3045>, upon thee; but will lay<WH5414> them upon all them that hate<WH8130> thee.

And thou shalt consume<WH398> all the people<WH5971> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> thee; thine eye<WH5869> shall have no pity<WH2347> upon them: neither shalt thou serve<WH5647> their gods<WH430>; for that will be a snare<WH4170> unto thee.
If thou shalt say<WH559> in thine heart<WH3824>, These nations<WH1471> are more<WH7227> than I; how<WH349> can<WH3201> I dispossess<WH3423> them?
Thou shalt not be afraid<WH3372> of them: but shalt well<WH2142> remember<WH2142> what the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> did<WH6213> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and unto all Egypt<WH4714>;

The great<WH1419> temptations<WH4531> which thine eyes<WH5869> saw<WH7200>, and the signs<WH226>, and the wonders<WH4159>, and the mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and the stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, whereby the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought thee out<WH3318>: so shall the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> do<WH6213> unto all the people<WH5971> of whom thou art afraid<WH3373><WH6440>.
Moreover the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will send<WH7971> the hornet<WH6880> among them, until they that are left<WH7604>, and hide<WH5641> themselves from<WH6440> thee, be destroyed<WH6>.
Thou shalt not be affrighted<WH6206> at<WH6440> them: for the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> is among<WH7130> you, a mighty<WH1419> God<WH410> and terrible<WH3372>.

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will put out<WH5394> those<WH411> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> thee by little<WH4592> and little<WH4592>: thou mayest<WH3201> not consume<WH3615> them at once<WH4118>, lest the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> increase<WH7235> upon thee.
But the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them unto thee<WH6440>, and shall destroy<WH1949> them with a mighty<WH1419> destruction<WH4103>, until they be destroyed<WH8045>.

And he shall deliver<WH5414> their kings<WH4428> into thine hand<WH3027>, and thou shalt destroy<WH6> their name<WH8034> from under heaven<WH8064>: there shall no man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> thee, until thou have destroyed<WH8045> them.

The graven images<WH6456> of their gods<WH430> shall ye burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784>: thou shalt not desire<WH2530> the silver<WH3701> or gold<WH2091> that is on them, nor take<WH3947> it unto thee, lest thou be snared<WH3369> therein: for it is an abomination<WH8441> to the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>.

Neither shalt thou bring<WH935> an abomination<WH8441> into thine house<WH1004>, lest thou be a cursed thing<WH2764> like it: but thou shalt utterly<WH8262> detest<WH8262> it, and thou shalt utterly<WH8581> abhor<WH8581> it; for it is a cursed thing<WH2764>.
